items.sentence: There is no way that my punctuation in French can be perfect, though I keep on trying.
I wish I was smart enough to invent something that sold well enough for me to get rich.
I would like to drastically decrease the amount of time it takes me to clean the house.
Tom knew that he wasn\'t going to be able to convince Mary to go to the dance with him.
Sometimes you don\'t need to speak the same language in order to understand each other.
